org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.service.Scheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchedulerInterface

    public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements SchedulerInterface
    The scheduler is responsible for waking-up all the input tasks in a taskgraph when the taskgraph is run.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      StampedeLog stampedeLog 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scheduler(TaskGraph taskgraph)
      Construct a scheduler for the given taskgraph and registers it with all the tasks in the taskgraph
